sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CMTBMTCD( MTCD_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), MTCD_STND_GUBN CHAR(1), MTCD_STND_DEGR VARCHAR(10), MTCD_MOLD_CODE CHAR(4), MTCD_GUBN_CODE VARCHAR(6), MTCD_CODE VARCHAR(8), MTCD_SORT_NUMB NUMBER(10, 0), MTCD_GUBN_NAME VARCHAR(50), MTCD_CODE_NAME VARCHAR(50), MTCD_APPL_GROP1 VARCHAR(8), MTCD_APPL_GROP2 VARCHAR(8), MTCD_APPL_GROP3 VARCHAR(8), MTCD_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1), MTCD_REMK VARCHAR(200), MTCD_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), MTCD_UPDT_DATE CHAR(8), MTCD_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), MTCD_INIT_DATE CHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CMTBMTCD_PK PRIMARY KEY ( MTCD_CORP_CODE, MTCD_STND_GUBN, MTCD_STND_DEGR, MTCD_MOLD_CODE, MTCD_GUBN_CODE, MTCD_CODE ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_CORP_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_STND_GUBN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_STND_DEGR', 'VARCHAR', 10 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_MOLD_CODE', 'CHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_GUBN_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 6 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_SORT_NUMB', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_GUBN_NAME', 'VARCHAR', 50 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_CODE_NAME', 'VARCHAR', 50 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_APPL_GROP1', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_APPL_GROP2', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_APPL_GROP3', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_APPL_GUBN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_REMK', 'VARCHAR', 200 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_UPDT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_UPDT_DATE', 'CHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_INIT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'CMTBMTCD' , 'MTCD_INIT_DATE', 'CHAR', 8 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'MTCD_CORP_CODE', '....' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'MTCD_STND_GUBN', '....' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'MTCD_STND_DEGR', '....' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'MTCD_MOLD_CODE', '....' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'MTCD_GUBN_CODE', '....' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'MTCD_CODE', '..' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'MTCD_SORT_NUMB', 'SORT..' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'MTCD_GUBN_NAME', '...' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'MTCD_CODE_NAME', '...' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'MTCD_APPL_GROP1', '....1' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'MTCD_APPL_GROP2', '....2' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'MTCD_APPL_GROP3', '....3' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'MTCD_APPL_GUBN', '....' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'MTCD_REMK', 'REMARK' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'MTCD_UPDT_CMAN', '...' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'MTCD_UPDT_DATE', '...' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'MTCD_INIT_CMAN', '...' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'MTCD_INIT_DATE', '...' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02
sql-descriptor.sq: WITH T01 ( MTCD_CORP_CODE ,MTCD_STND_GUBN ,MTCD_STND_DEGR ,MTCD_MOLD_CODE ,MTCD_GUBN_CODE ,MTCD_CODE ,MTCD_SORT_NUMB ,MTCD_GUBN_NAME ,MTCD_CODE_NAME ,MTCD_APPL_GROP1 ,MTCD_APPL_GROP2 ,MTCD_APPL_GROP3 ,MTCD_APPL_GUBN ,MTCD_REMK ,MTCD_UPDT_CMAN ,MTCD_UPDT_DATE ,MTCD_INIT_CMAN ,MTCD_INIT_DATE ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'C_CYLH', 7, 'ITEM구분_중자금형', 'CYLINDER HEAD', 'CTALCO', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'C_FLYW', 9, 'ITEM구분_중자금형', 'FLY WHEEL', 'CTALCO', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'C_GENL', 11, 'ITEM구분_중자금형', '일반', 'CTALCO', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'C_MANI', 10, 'ITEM구분_중자금형', 'MANIFOLD', 'CTALCO', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'C_OILP', 8, 'ITEM구분_중자금형', 'OIL PAN', 'CTALCO', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'O_6MAN', 5, 'ITEM구분_외형금형', '6기통 MANIFOLD', 'CTALST', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'O_CYLH', 1, 'ITEM구분_외형금형', 'CYLINDER HEAD', 'CTALST', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'O_FLYW', 4, 'ITEM구분_외형금형', 'FLY WHEEL', 'CTALST', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'O_GENL', 6, 'ITEM구분_외형금형', '일반', 'CTALST', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'O_OIL1', 2, 'ITEM구분_외형금형', 'OIL PAN:금형면적 40dm2 이하', 'CTALST', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC01', 'O_OIL2', 3, 'ITEM구분_외형금형', 'OIL PAN:금형면적 40dm2 초과', 'CTALST', NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC02', 'COLD_H2', 12, '중자설비', 'COLD H-2', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'N', '미적용:부품원가기준서에 명시사항없음', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC02', 'SHEL_H1', 13, '중자설비', 'SHELL H-1', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'N', '미적용:부품원가기준서에 명시사항없음', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC02', 'SHEL_H2', 14, '중자설비', 'SHELL H-2', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'N', '미적용:부품원가기준서에 명시사항없음', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC02', 'SHEL_V1', 15, '중자설비', 'SHELL V-1', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC02', 'SHEL_V2', 16, '중자설비', 'SHELL V-2', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC03', 'LHD', 17, 'LHD/RHD금형구분', '일반금형 or LHD금형', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC03', 'RHD', 18, 'LHD/RHD금형구분', 'RHD금형(LHD금형有)', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC04', 'B1', 21, '1호 금형계산구분', '복제(2호이상)금형', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC04', 'GENL', 19, '1호 금형계산구분', '일반금형', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC04', 'LHRH', 20, '1호 금형계산구분', 'LH/RH 금형', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC05', 'LH', 22, 'LH/RH금형구분', '일반금형 or LH금형', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'H', '7-4', 'MALC', 'MALC05', 'RH', 23, 'LH/RH금형구분', 'RH금형', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Y', NULL, 'SYSTEM24', '20240206', 'SYSTEM24', '20240206' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.MTCD_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CMTBMTCD B ON B.MTCD_CORP_CODE = A.MTCD_CORP_CODE AND B.MTCD_STND_GUBN = A.MTCD_STND_GUBN AND B.MTCD_STND_DEGR = A.MTCD_STND_DEGR AND B.MTCD_MOLD_CODE = A.MTCD_MOLD_CODE AND B.MTCD_GUBN_CODE = A.MTCD_GUBN_CODE AND B.MTCD_CODE = A.MTCD_CODE
SELECT * FROM CMTBMTCD WHERE MTCD_MOLD_CODE = 'MALC' AND MTCD_STND_DEGR = '7-4'
